nodes.title: Environment
nodes.body: The township has forests in its valleys’ upper reaches, but not in their lower areas. The forests are quite diverse (stag pa, gyer pa, son shing, shug pa), and the wildlife includes wolves.

nodes.title: Location
nodes.body: Wendu's seat is located about thirty minutes car ride from the Repgong prefectural seat. It is also situated about thirty kilometers from the Yadzi County town.
